title: Jean-Bernard Fernandez-Versini seen with Cheryl lookalike

text:
He had a tumultuous break-up from Cheryl last year, following just two years of marriage.
But Jean-Bernard Fernandez-Versini, 36, looked like he was enjoying the single life as he was spotted leaving London's Chiltern Firehouse with a woman bearing a striking resemblance to his stunning ex-wife.
And, in a bizarre twist of the fate, the lady he stepped out with happened to be Tamara Ralph - the woman who designed Cheryl's stunning wedding party dress after she and Jean-Bernard celebrated their nuptials in the UK, reports The Sun.
Scroll down for video
Ex factor: Jean-Bernard Fernandez-Versini was spotted at London's Chiltern Firehouse with Tamara Ralph - the woman who designed his ex Cheryl's wedding party dress - on Wednesday
Jean-Bernard looked in high spirits as he walked behind his mystery gal pal, before stopping to pose for awaiting cameras.
The handsome Frenchman cut a casual yet chic figure in a taupe-coloured jacket, paired with form-fitting blue jeans.
Meanwhile, his companion looked elegant in a ruffled blush-pink frock, while wrapping up warm with a fur-covered overcoat.
The way they were: Cheryl was seen wearing the eye-catching dress at her wedding celebration at private London club The Library in July 2014
A sheer delight: The flattering off-shoulder gown featured black sheer chiffon skirt
After Jean-Bernard and Cheryl tied the knot in an intimate ceremony on the Caribbean island of Mustique in July 2014, they later jetted back to the UK and had a bigger celebration with 80 guests at private club The Library in London.
It was for the second round of celebrations that Tamara designed Cheryl's gown.
The designer, who co-owns fashion brand Ralph & Russo with Michael Russo told Vogue at the time: 'This gown was perfect for Cheryl on her special day. The play on fabrics and simple silhouette is what really makes this gown so striking.
'The sumptuous, rich velvet and duchesse silk bodice contrasted with a delicate, sheer silk-chiffon skirt brought an element of fun to the overall look whilst still being romantic.
Special: Tamara said at the time that the gown was 'perfect for Cheryl on her special day'

Jean was spotted with yet another brunette beauty in January, where the pair enjoyed an art exhibition, Emotion In Motion, at The Den at 100 Wardour Street.
His latest outing comes as pregnant Cheryl's due date looms.

Moving on: Cheryl has since moved on, settling into a romance with Liam Payne, with whom she's expecting her first child
Speaking about the situation for the first time earlier this month, Jean Bernard admitted he found out through the media that his former spouse is having a child with Liam.
JB told the London Evening Standard's ES magazine: 'Funnily enough that [the news] was how I heard.'
The restaurant owner had nothing but kind words to say about his ex's happy news and said having children makes the world a 'better place'.
He added: 'It's a great thing to have babies. There are so many sad things these days, if everyone was creating life, the world would be a better place.'
